Medium: .1 = cut-and-pasted paper and felt-tipped pen over laid with synthetic polymer film on paper mounted on board .2 = pen and ink and black and red felt- tipped pens .3 = felt-tipped pen overlaid with syn thetic polymer film .4,.5 = pen and ink and felt- tipped pen overlaid with synthetic polymer film .6 = pen and ink .7 = felt-tipped pen .8 = pen and ink, felt-tipped pen, and gouache overlaid with synthetic polymer film
CreditLine: Gift of the Department of Publications, The Museum of Modern Art
Title: 8 Drawings for the Museum publication I REMEMBER CHRISTMAS
